Name: Mystic Isles
About the game: Mystic Isles is an online multiplayer strategy board game. Your journey begins on a fantasy island with mystical powers. You take on the role of a traveler who can harness the five elements: Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, and Earth. You must gather the elements to grow your empire. As you are expanding your territory, so are your rivals. The game involves strategic planning, cunning negotiation, and a pinch of luck. You can play with 2 - 6 friends online on the Steam Platform.
